title: Science Competency Enhancement Program Through 4C/ID Model-Based Powerful Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science concepts understanding and hands-on experience with experimental tools
context.additional_context: Practice-centered program for education university undergraduates to design elementary science pedagogy using the 4C/ID model, with optional digital tool integration in BYOD environments.

learning_goals: Learners can design science lesson plans applying the four core components of the 4C/ID model (Learning Tasks, Supportive Information, Part-Task Practice, Coaching).
Learners can implement innovative teaching methods applicable to actual elementary science classrooms through project-based assessments.
Learners can write reports comparing and analyzing the effectiveness differences of the 4C/ID model based on ICT tool usage.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
